title: Dream-Watch
subtitle: Resale Website
features: There are three roles such as admin, sellers, and buyers. Admin manage all users
Sellers can add their products and manage all products such as  delete, advertise, cancel advertise. Advertise products are showing home page

Buyers can book any products. After the booking is complete then navigate to my orders page. On my orders page, two options buyers can delete orders or payment orders. Payment method integrates by react stripe
ogin with email/password and Google, applied JWT token for server data security

title: Foodie-Express
subtitle: Service review website
features: There are some services and also users can add more services dynamically
Users can post their reviews on a particular service and also edit and update their reviews
Login with email/password, Google. Used Firebase Authentication. Applied JWT token for server data security.

subtitle: Learning website
features: There are some courses. Users can purchase any of them
Courses details and payment section is in a private route after login then redirecting them to the page they were
Login with email/password, Google/GitHub Used Firebase Authentication.
